participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and supportive, she enjoys comforting others and sharing her interests.
participant_1.background: I remember my father coming home at night after a long shift and telling me stories about his day. I love to go to the lake. On the weekend I like to go to the beach to relax and have fun. I comfort myself with my dolls. My parents were scientists.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and introspective, he tends to worry about others' opinions but is passionate about his pursuits.
participant_2.background: I am afraid to tell my parents how I feel about my job because I know they will be disappointed. I'm pursuing my law degree. I remember playing guitar with my friends in my basement for hours. I drive a blue Honda Civic. I've always been afraid of heights, but I overcame my fear when I went bungee jumping.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Good, I'm getting ready for a big test tomorrow.
Oh, a test. That sounds stressful. What are you studying for?
I am studying for my law degree.
Oh, cool. What made you decide to get into law?
I've always been interested in the law, and I think it's a great way to help people.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I hope so.
What are you most nervous about for the test?
I'm mostly nervous about the essay portion. I'm not the best writer.
I'm sure you'll do fine. Just take your time and focus on your strengths.
Thanks, I'll try.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play guitar, go to the beach, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like fun. I like to go to the lake, play video games, and read.
Oh, I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I'm really into fantasy novels right now.
I've never read a fantasy novel before, but I've heard good things about them.
You should give them a try! They're really fun.
I will, thanks for the recommendation
